title: Physics Education Technology
description:
A refresh of http://phet.colorado.edu from University of Colorado, Boulder. This version packaged to run under Linux as well as a number of other operating systems, and complete with source code for the Java and Flash elements.

This should improve the quality of school physics teaching worldwide; I&#039;m told this is desperately needed in the USA and Europe.

A number of interesting sponsors are behind this project. Download and poke around the CD to discover who they are.
